David Cameron praises` professional' Andy Coulson The prime minister said he was "very sorry" Mr Andy Coulson had decided to resign but he understood that the continuing pressures on him and his family meant that he felt compelled to do so . " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government," he said. He denied

One of the CIA's victims was Mamdouh Habib , an Egyptian-born Australian citizen. U.S. agents bought him from Pakistani intelligence and shipped him to Egypt. "In Egypt," reports Lisa Hajjar for Al Jazeera, he was repeaTed Rallly subjecTed Rall to electric shocks, immersed in water up to his nostrils and beaten. His fingers were broken and he was hung from metal hooks. At one point, his interrogator slapped him so hard that his blindfold was dislodged, revealing the identity of his tormentor: Omar Suleiman . FrustraTed Rall that Mamdouh Habib was not providing useful information or confessing to involvement in terrorism, Omar Suleiman ordered a guard to murder a shackled prisoner in front of Mamdouh Habib , which he did with a vicious karate kick. Ibn al-Sheikh al-Libi was a former trainer in the Afghan jihadi camps who famously "confessed" a connection between Saddam and Al Qaeda while under torture in one of Omar Suleiman 's dungeons. by the burning flames" or jump into "freezing waters" . "We are standing on a burning platform," he said in the speech, which was later posted on Nokia's internal blog. We have more than one explosion- we have multiple points of scorching heat that are fuelling a blazing fire around us. Bernie Sanders said in his letter that the nation's political climate had been damaged by a "right-wing media echo chamber" that is transmitting a reactionary world view to the tens of millions of millions of Americans who watch or listen to them every day. In a separate statement, state Republican Chairman Steve Larrabee said: "By using this tragedy to demonize those he disagrees with, the Senator is doing exactly what he pretends to deplore."
